Name: VENDORID
Description: Vendor ID. Required if Action is not set to Draft.

Name: WHENCREATED
Description: Transaction date in format mm/dd/yyyy. Required if Action is not set to Draft.

Name: WHENPOSTED
Description: GL posting date in format mm/dd/yyyy. Not used if PRBATCH provided.

Name: BILLTOPAYTOCONTACTNAME
Description: Pay to contact

Name: SHIPTORETURNTOCONTACTNAME
Description: Return to contact

Name: RECORDID
Description: Bill number

Name: DOCNUMBER
Description: Reference number

Name: DESCRIPTION
Description: Description

Name: TERMNAME
Description: Payment term

Name: RECPAYMENTDATE
Description: Recommended to pay on date in format mm/dd/yyyy

Name: SUPDOCID
Description: Attachments ID

Name: WHENDUE
Description: Due date in format mm/dd/yyyy. Required if Action is not set to Draft.

Name: PAYMENTPRIORITY
Description: Payment priority. urgent, high, normal (default), low

Name: ONHOLD
Description: On hold. false - No (detault) true - Yes

Name: PRBATCH
Description: Summary name to post into. Required if bill summary option is set to user specified in AP config.

Name: CURRENCY
Description: Transaction currency code

Name: BASECURR
Description: Base currency code

Name: EXCH_RATE_DATE
Description: Exchange rate date in format mm/dd/yyyy

Name: EXCH_RATE_TYPE_ID
Description: Exchange rate type. Do not use if EXCHANGE_RATE is set. (Leave blank to use Intacct Daily Rate)

Name: EXCHANGE_RATE
Description: Exchange rate value. Do not use if EXCH_RATE_TYPE_ID is set.

Name: INCLUSIVETAX
Description: Inclusive taxes. Set to true to have the system calculate the transaction amount (TRX_AMOUNT) for the bill line and the transaction tax (TRX_TAX) for the tax entry based on the value supplied for TOTALTRXAMOUNT on the bill line and the tax rate of the tax detail (DETAILID) for the tax entry. (AU, GB, ZA only)

Name: ACTION
Description: Action to execute on create. Submit (default) or Draft

Name: TAXSOLUTIONID
Description: Tax solution name, such as United Kingdom - VAT or Australia - GST. Required only if the company is configured for multiple tax jurisdictions and the transaction is occurring at the top level of the company. See Tax Solutions for more information. (GB, AU, and ZA only)

Name: APBILLITEMS
Description: Bill lines, must have at least 1. Custom field name
